text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: ――Well then, Kris S-san. Will you tell us now? Who is it you want to team up with?
Today, Symboli Kris S would announce the results of the [Trainer Selection]――
Since I wasn't even participating, there was no reason I would be selected. However―― now that I knew her, I couldn't help but hope.
Our eyes met. In that moment, I couldn't stop the words from spilling out.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: You.
Symboli Kris S' eyes were looking straight at me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――In this place, you're…… the one that knows me most. You tried to―― learn more about me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: About me. ――You said, I had results. Even if it was only a little…… you said I had them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: That's why. ……If it's with you, I can do it. ――That's what I feel.
It was that sincerity. It was the sincerity that I wanted to live up to…… That I had hoped for.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――What do you think?
choice_data_list: ……I look forward to working with you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――That's why ――I'm sorry.
Symboli Kris S lowered her head to them. Because she had turned down all the proper candidates!
choice_data_list: I…… I want to be her trainer! Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ah, no…… it's fine, it's fine. She's the one that decided, so I have no complaints!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That's right…… in the first place, we may not have tried enough to meet in the middle. Kris S-san, we apologize as well.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――…… I'm grateful.
――Several days later.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……Well then―― lastly―― a light cooldown.
After talking with Symboli Kris S, I was gradually getting accustomed to reducing her training load as much as possible.
Hey, working hard, I see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on becoming her trainer. I say that but…… this was well within my expectations.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I felt you were suited for it. Since both of you are a little similar.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yeah, without a doubt. ――Well, Kris S will be back in a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I shouldn't bother you, I'll excuse myself here. ……I'm leaving her to you, Trainer.
――Several days after that. After training had ended.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……? Why? You…… talk and laugh quite a lot.
Certainly not if you looked at words spoken…… Symboli Rudolf had said 『You're similar』, and I couldn't help but think about it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Not being similar…… is fine. I don't―― want to…… be misunderstood.
Even if the misunderstanding with the senpai trainers was cleared up, many of her Uma Musume classmates seemed to still be fearful of her.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I have you. I have a…… trainer. You―― understand a lot about me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――To fulfill my mission…… as long as I have you. It's sufficient――it's enough.
She's saying that she only needs one person to understand her. She wanted to focus on her mission――
choice_data_list: (……I want to help Kris S succeed)

text_block_list.text: That was also my desire, before I realized it, that's what I thought.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: I want to become my mentor's results―― is what I thought.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……what's wrong?
choice_data_list: ……If you want to fulfill your mission.
……If you want to fulfill your mission.

text_block_list.text: The similarity that Symboli Rudolf mentioned. ――It was that we both made someone else's dream our own.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――That's where we're similar? The same――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… …… …………――that's right.
Symboli Kris S nodded…… the look on her face told me she was convinced.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: It's the same.
――The two of us, who were so alike, would continue on together. With an important dream that we'd carry together.
Even if it hadn't been my dream―― that feeling was the truth.
